fields.label: Please put together a list of machinery and equipment owned by the business that has a value of $5,000 or more. When compiling the list please mention if there is anything owed to another funder for the equipment if it is a lease or it is being used as collateral for another loan. If there is money owed, please list how much. You will need a third-party to verify the value of each piece of equipment you list.
fields.name: me_machinery_equipment
fields.instructions: The machinery/ equipment can be used as collateral for a loan and/or in the event the business can’t pay the loan it can be sold off to pay down or off the loan.

fields.label: Please upload the most recent Business Valuation of the machinery and equipment.
fields.name: me_business_valuation
fields.instructions: This relates to the question above.  The funder will use the machinery/equipment as collateral and will want to sell it if the loan can’t be paid.
